page.title: 07Industry
page.content: Several problems have been identified regarding the location of new industry in{Montrose.}There has been a hap- hazard development of the{Northesk Rd/ {Broomfield Rd}industrial area and Government land and buildings at{ {Waldron Rd}may be available for industry in the near future.High grade agricultural land adjacent to{Montrose is coming under increasing development pressure. The main employers in{Montrose}are Glaxo-Chem,Cadbury Typhoo,Esk Foods, the Sea Oil Base at Ferryden,Morton's Bottling Plant,the Harbour and local hospitals.Also,many find work in the agricultural sectors of industry. The 1981 Population Census has shown that there is a considerable amount of townspeople who commute to other towns while a considerable number of people commute into the town to work.
